@Mr.Draconian wrote:

This is off topic but this is my first time buying a vps,I’m buying it from www.ovh.com but I dont know what distribution to choose or what version.

Read full topic

item.title: Best 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

It all comes down to your own perspective and purpose. These frameworks have all cons and pros. I would look at Phoenix released by Vix as I see it as a promising base. If you’re going with Apollo, you might want to look into the official github repository updated by Major. You also have runesource and hyperion. Both of these can suit the needs of a perfect rsps. I wouldn’t recommend winterlove derivatives.

Read full topic

item.title: Best 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the original release of apollo by graham and his brother is more than likely outdated due to the core plugins and libraries. im not sure about what exactly Atomic has improved, redone, or changed. you could probably ask him. he’s fairly active on this community and he knows his stuff pretty well.

as for sir james, im not very active over on r-s so i have no comment about his knowledge or the reliability of his content.

Read full topic

item.title: Best 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

I’m not looking for a source that has lots of features because I’m good at programing,I’m looking for a source that has stability.
Since you both advised me with apollo I’ll give it a try.

But which one? by Graham or AtomicInt_ or by Sir James1996

Read full topic

item.title: Best 317 source?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

“best”

are you asking for the most well designed server in terms of programming techniques and stability? the most content crammed inside of a server? the best to use to attract players?

if you have any knowledge of programming whatsoever you should look towards apollo. if you’re too incompetent to learn to use the framework you could probably go for something like runesource or hyperion. however there are few bases who have properly extended from the original releases.

if youre looking for the easiest to set up with lack of development on your side and just something to quickly set up with everything done. id probably go for one of the poorly designed project insanity derivatives. you could also look into the arios release, however that may or may not be infected. who knows.

you could also elaborate on what you’re actually looking for so someone may be able to help you before this is locked, seeing as the way this topic stands it isnt allowed to simply request a server. we have a download section for a reason.

Read full topic
